It was to give in His own life an illustration of  unselfishness that Jesus came in the form of humanity. And all 

612 

who accept this principle are to be workers together with Him in demonstrating it in practical life. To choose the right because it is right; to stand for truth at the cost of suffering and sacrifice--"this is the  heritage of the servants of the Lord, and their righteousness is of Me, saith the Lord" (Isaiah 54:17).--Ed 154, 155 (1903).
